content.html: If you're attending @ffconf or not, I've got a special little treat for you either way: I built an ffconf Gameboy game. That works on a real Gameboy, on an emulator AND the web. URL (and ROM) released during @ffconf tomorrow.
content.value:
If you're attending @ffconf or not, I've got a special little treat for you either way:

I built an ffconf Gameboy game. 

That works on a real Gameboy, on an emulator AND the web. 

URL (and ROM) released during @ffconf tomorrow.
